description: The Pure Drop Toilet Odor Eliminator lets you go to the restroom and leave it smelling fresh for the next person. Simply place a drop of the liquid in the bowl before you go and it eats away any smells. This bathroom odor eliminator is fantastic to take with you when you visit someone's home. You can be the ideal guest and avoid any awkward situations with this item.
